original_title: Living Landscapes: World's Most Beautiful Sunrises and Sunsets
overview: Living Landscapes HD Earthscapes transform your screen into a window on the world's most inspiring natural scenery. An instant cure for nature deficit disorder! Beautiful sunrises & golden sunsets from around the globe set to beautiful music. Inspiring locations include: Thailand, the Seychelles, Canyonlands National Park, Bali, the Pacific Coast & migratory birds in the National Wildlife Refuges.
title: Living Landscapes: World's Most Beautiful Sunrises and Sunsets
